protein.specific_function: Required for mitochondrial integrity and T-cell survival. May contribute to T-cell quiescence

reference.reference_text: Zenz T, Roessner A, Thomas A, Frohling S, Dohner H, Calabretta B, Daheron L: hIan5: the human ortholog to the rat Ian4/Iddm1/lyp is a new member of the Ian family that is overexpressed in B-cell lymphoid malignancies. Genes Immun. 2004 Mar;5(2):109-16.
